CONNECTION_ERROR.description: Payload for Socket.IO event CONNECTION_ERROR (when handshake query is invalid/missing id).
CONNECTION_ERROR.title: CONNECTION_ERROR payload

DEBUG_STATUS_UPDATED.description: Payload for Socket.IO namespace /debug event DEBUG_STATUS_UPDATED.
DEBUG_STATUS_UPDATED.title: DEBUG_STATUS_UPDATED payload

CaptureImage.description: Single captured image summary as serialized in STATUS_UPDATED / capture store.
CaptureImage.title: CaptureImage

StoredCaptureSummary.description: Summary of a stored capture (capture store entry).
StoredCaptureSummary.title: StoredCaptureSummary

setSystemTime.request.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds since epoch. Firmware rejects dates before 2018-01-01.
setSystemTime.request.title: setSystemTime request
